text: The 2017 ICC World Cricket League East Asia-Pacific Region Qualifiers was an international cricket tournament that took place in Bendigo, Australia. The teams competing in the tournament are Vanuatu, Fiji, Indonesia, Japan, Philippines and Samoa. The winner of the qualifiers progressed to ICC WCL Division 5 which will be staged in September 2017. == Teams == Six teams invited by ICC for the tournament: * * * * * * == Points table == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=200 |Team !width=30 abbr="Played" |P !width=30 abbr="Won" |W !width=30 abbr="Lost" |L !width=30 abbr="Tied" |T !width=30 abbr="No result" |NR !width=60 |Points !width=60 abbr="Net run rate" |NRR !width=417 |Qualification |-style="background: #D0F0C0;" | align="left" | || 5 || 5 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 10 || +2.935 || rowspan=1| 2017 ICC World Cricket League Division Five |- | align="left" | || 5 || 4 || 1 || 0 || 0 || 8 || +1.050 ||rowspan=5| |- | align="left" | || 5 || 3 || 2 || 0 || 0 || 6 || +0.340 |- | align="left" | || 5 || 2 || 3 || 0 || 0 || 4 || -0.580 |- | align="left" | || 5 || 1 || 4 || 0 || 0 || 2 || -1.927 |- | align="left" | || 5 || 0 || 5 || 0 || 0 || 0 || -1.642 |} Source: Cricinfo == References == Category:2017–19 ICC World Cricket League Category:2017 in cricket
